name: projectile-plasma-shot

Small glowing energy sphere with trailing particles, bright yellow-white core with blue outer glow. Should look powerful but simple. 8x8 pixels base size with 2-3 frame animation for pulsing/spinning effect.
gameStyle: retro pixel art platformer, Mega Man inspired, 16-bit style

specifications.behavior: travels horizontally, damages enemies on contact
